name: Caprism
desc: After all allies use their Ultimates a total of 2 time(s), deals 2 instances of Wind DMG equal to 600% base DMG to a random enemy target. This DMG will deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to adjacent units. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances by 1 in this battle and increases the Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 12%, to a maximum of 15 time(s).
